sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Tube Filling Machine for packaging ointments and creams.
sections.scope: Applicable to packaging activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Verify cleanliness of the hopper, filling nozzles, and tube holders.
Load empty tubes into the magazine or holders with proper orientation.
Fill the hopper with the semi-solid product.
Set the fill volume and sealing temperature parameters.
Perform a trial run to check fill weight and seal quality.
Adjust the 'no-tube-no-fill' sensor and batch printing unit.
Start the automatic filling, sealing, and coding process.
Monitor the tubes for leakage and aesthetic seal quality.
Collect the filled tubes and perform in-process quality checks.
Clean the machine thoroughly after the production run.
precautions: Monitor the sealing temperature closely to avoid burnt seals or leaks.
Ensure consistent product level in the hopper for fill weight accuracy.
Keep fingers away from moving parts and sealing jaws.
Check for proper coding/batch details on every tube.
